column3: You will learn about the expanded form and rounding off numbers
column4: You plan to learn it better through notebook practice work and task worksheets. You also plan to continue doing practice at home to practice rounding off numbers.

column3: You will learn about rounding off while calculating the sum and difference of 3 digit numbers.
column4: You plan to learn it better through notebook practice work and task worksheets. You also plan to continue doing practice at home to speed up your calculations.

column3: You plan to explore plane shapes
column4: You plan to do activities like tiling pattern and sequence of designs using tangrams to learn about plane shapes. You also plan to use an online app for protractor.
